Room.Name: The Eastern Crossroads
Room.Description: You are standing just outside of the city, and sight of the guards at the gate.

Room.Name: The Eastern Outskirts of Astoria
Room.Description: Just barely outside of the City of Astoria, you can still here the cacophony of the busy markets and adventurers going about their business there. The road is large enough for wagons and merchants, though there are few to be seen out here.

Room.Name: Southern Crossroads
Room.Description: You are at the crossroads between Astoria, the city outskirts and Miden'nir. The forest awaits you to the south, or the city to the north. You can continue on the outskirts to the east and west.

Room.Name: Tigris River
Room.Description: The river widens here, to accomodate embarking and disembarking boat passengers on both sides of the docks. A pleasent musty smell rises from the river water, no doubt from whatever chemical is used to clean and sanitize it this close to the city.

Room.Name: Tigris River
